benchmark_details.name: WIKIDOMAINS
benchmark_details.overview: WIKIDOMAINS is a dataset of 22k definitions from 13 academic domains paired with a difficult concept within each definition, designed to support targeted concept simplification for readers encountering domain-specific text.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate reading comprehension by helping readers understand difficult concepts within domain-specific definitions.

data.source: Wikipedia articles containing definitions across 13 academic domains.
data.annotation: Automatically annotated difficult concepts using a heuristic.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated using human evaluations and comparison to original definitions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in preserving meaning and ease of understanding.
methodology.baseline_results: Dictionary baseline showed comparable performance to the best LLMs.
methodology.validation: Results validated with human judgments and correlation with automated metrics.
